author: Jordan B Peterson
description:
This is a clip from our recent podcast release with Dr. Simone Gold. In it, she and Dr. Jordan B. Peterson discuss the oppression created and suffered from participating in a lie, how the outcomes scale on the societal level, and the remarkable (and disparate) courage it takes to stand for the truth. 

Unlock the ad-free experience of The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast and dive into exclusive bonus content on DailyWire+. Start watching now: http://dwpluspeterson.com/yt

title: The Consequences of Living in a Perpetual Lie | Dr. Simone Gold
